DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects events from Dell Aventail SSL VPN appliances (NOT E-class).

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.pattern: msg="Clock is out of sync with Active Directory server \([-\w. ]+\)"
msg="(?:Best group so far|Considering SSL-VPN group|Created session under group|Found existing SSL-VPN group|Matched AD group): [^"]+"

FastFormatter.format: Password for "$6" will expire in $9 days

FastPattern.description: UserAuthAudit: Error binding to LDAP server
FastPattern.pattern: msg="Error in binding to LDAP server.*"
msg="\d+ User .+ cannot log in\.(?:\^[A-Z])?\s*" proto=\w+

FastPattern.description: UserLogoff: User logged out by admin
ServiceWarning: License Manager SSL connection failed

FastPattern.pattern: msg="NetExtender client address range appears exhausted\."

FastPattern.matcher: ^(\d+).* id=sslvpn sn=[A-F\d]+ mgmtip=([\d.]+) time="[-\w: ]+" m=(\d+) i=(\d+) pt=(\d+\.\d+) lic=(\d+)
FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+.* id=sslvpn sn=[A-F\d]+ mgmtip=[\d.]+ time="[-\w: ]+" m=\d+ i=\d+ pt=\d+\.\d+ lic=\d+

FastPattern.description: UserAuthAudit: Filter-Id is disabled for this domain
FastPattern.pattern: msg="Filter-Id is disabled for this domain
msg="Too many login failures\. +The account has been disabled for \d+ minutes\."
msg="Signature Database has been updated automatically\."

FastPattern.description: SoftwareUpdate: WAF signature database has been updated
FastPattern.pattern: msg="WAF signature database has been updated"

FastPattern.description: SoftwareUpdate: WAF Signature Database Update was downloaded successfully
FastPattern.pattern: msg="WAF Signature Database Update was downloaded successfully\.

FastField.defaultValue: "WAF Signature Database" Update was downloaded successfully

FastPattern.description: UserAuthAudit: No match for LDAP attribute

FastPattern.pattern: msg="SSO is not enabled for URL '[^'"]+'"

FastPattern.description: WebTrafficAudit: WAF detect, Taiwan Identification Number
FastPattern.pattern: msg="WAF threat detected: Taiwan Identification Number \([\w ]+\)"

FastField.defaultValue: Type: "$7", Rule-match: $9, Attack Category: "$10", Signature ID: $11

FastPattern.description: WebTrafficAudit: WAF detect, Visa Credit Card Number
FastPattern.pattern: msg="WAF threat detected: Visa Credit Card Number Disclosure [()\w ]+"

FastField.defaultValue: Type: "$7", Rule-match: $9, Attack Category: "$10", Signature ID: $11

FastPattern.matcher: ^(\d+).* fw=(\S+) pri=\d+ m=(\d+).* src=(\S*) dst=(\S*) user="([^"]+)" usr="[^"]*" msg="([^"]+)" cookieTampering=(.+) proto=(\S+) URI=(\S*) agent="[^"]+".*

FastPattern.description: WebTrafficAudit: WAF (prevent,detected) System Command Injection Variant
FastPattern.pattern: msg="WAF threat (?:prevented|detected): (?:System Command Injection Variant \d+ Header Check"|Name Unknown")

FastField.defaultValue: Type: "$7", Rule-match: $9, Attack Category: "$10", Signature ID: $11

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning: Botnet Filter Service is not licensed
FastPattern.pattern: msg="Botnet Filter Service is not licensed"

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: End Point Security check successful
ServiceWarning: Domain setting requires client certificate
ServiceInfo: Requesting certificate from client browser

FastPattern.pattern: msg="server ip \([\d.]+\), respectively, server host name

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: Attempting to verify certificate for user
FastPattern.pattern: msg="Attempting to verify certificate for user
msg="(?:verifyUserName|Found.*?CN|Finding AD CN|Cert verified successfully|Password never expires)

FastPattern.description: IPTrafficAudit: All packets will be denied
FastPattern.pattern: msg="All packets from [\d.]+ will be denied"
msg="All packets from [-\w.]+ will be allowed"

FastPattern.matcher: ^(\d+).* fw=(\S+) pri=\d+ m=(\d+).* src=(\S*) dst=(\S*) user="([^"]+)" usr="[^"]*" msg="Remediation failed for ([.\d]+)" agent="[^"]+".*
